activities: IDM is a litigation support service provider specializing in processing of Electronically Stored Information (ESI) for law firms and service bureaus involved in litigation. ESI from the EU will be collected and transfered to our offices under the guidance of our clients for many reasons including:  the extraction of ESI metadata; data indexing for the purposes of searching; printing to physical paper or TIFF image; conversion to a database format to facilitate attorney review.
contactoff1: 70 S. Lake Ave, Suite 1000, Pasadena, CA 91101
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
